subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Order #SSN1467 confirmed
description_text:
Hi,

What is the update on this matter? When can I receive the missing parts?

Please follow up. I will start warning the online sim racing community about this.

conversations.body_text: Hi Pandu Wirawan, We will follow up immediately — it seems the warehouse staff may have missed the reshipment. I’ll look into it right away and get back to you shortly with the tracking number.

Hello, Pandu Wirawan, Can you please take a picture of the item received? Since the base consists of three parts - the main base plate, carbon fiber support plate, and limit plate - I'm worried that there might be an error when replacing parts, so I want to confirm.
Hello, Pandu Wirawan, The replacement has been sent, but we still need you to provide photos for confirmation. YT2515700707002662 https://www.yunexpress.com/.
I have received the base plate. Picture is attached. Thank you.
